text: Pitcairnia clarkii is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador, where it is known only from the type locality in Esmeraldas Province. It grows in coastal forest in a protected area.Manzanares, J.M. & Pitman, N. 2003. Pitcairnia clarkii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 2003.
